introduction: SYNOPSISMin-su's father, Jung, is a wealthy man with little education. He wishes to have an intelligent daughter-in-law and have the matchmaker find a beautiful and smart woman. Na-young having aware of his vanity tricks them and runs away with his money. Min-su and his friend look for her despite all the troubles they go through. Not being able to spend all the money, Na-young learns her own vanity and greed.故事数字和种子是一个愿望haneunge得到女儿女婿尽可能聪明的女孩，因为平民父亲荣格被困扰之间，但赚到的钱太多不满智力渴望分享友谊，但受到来自占领店铺介绍dayoung的淑女。美丽与智慧和dayoung出国留学走开打荣格冒用heoyok。找到dayoung是她职业生涯的谎言产卵找到民用和钱，你要确保事情是使每一个痛苦，并参观了国家。然而，偶然遇见了大英，但她不能多写钱，知道这贪婪是多么的轻浮。
